## hstack() function

Create a horizontal stack layout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hstack(...children: ViewNode[]): LayoutNode;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

children


</td><td>

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

View nodes to stack horizontally


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[LayoutNode](./dsl.layoutnode.md)

A new [LayoutNode](./dsl.layoutnode.md) with horizontal stacking

## Remarks

Arranges child views horizontally on the same line. Children are rendered in order from left to right.

## Example


```typescript
hstack(
  text('Left'),
  text(' | '),
  text('Right')
)
```
